name: Infocular eTechnologies Pvt Ltd
description:
Infocular E-Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is on of prestigious organization in the IT space. The U.S, Canadian, Mexican and Australian businesses are part of the Infocular worldwide group of companies dedicated to the discovery, development,manufacturing, and marketing of innovative technology and other IT products/services.
Our software technology division primarily focuses on Industry Solutions, Product Development Solutions, and related Software Products, Platforms and Services through seamless integration of software and services. Our services further extend to Hardware Systems and Solutions for optimizing and/or reducing energy loads. This is achieved by implementation of company engineered energy efficient devises.
Emphasizing on “Beyond IT” as its brand commitment and corporate philosophy, Infocular has been involved in building its core competence to create value for customer and society. We are dedicated to go beyond technology in order to bring more value to our services by encompassing a series of strategies. We are a resolute Team of Professionals that believes in Company’s values and take great pride in its work. It is because of such values that our prestigious organization is ceaselessly gaining recognition and respect from customers, society and adversaries alike, around the globe.
